alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Wilson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 8:01AM CDT until June 03 at 8:19PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Verdigris River at Independence affecting Wilson and Montgomery Counties. Verdigris River at Coffeyville affecting Montgomery County. For the Verdigris River...including Altoona, Independence, Coffeyville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Verdigris River at Independence. * WHEN...From this evening to Friday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 39.9 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Verdigris River Independence 30.0 14.3 Wed 7 am CDT 39.7 31.6 15.0 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
